text: Catherine McKenney (born June 3, 1961) is an Ottawa City Councillor representing Somerset Ward which consists of Centretown, Centretown West, and the downtown core. McKenney was first elected in the city's 2014 municipal election."McKenney replaces former boss Holmes; City hall insider holds senior post, once worked for longtime councillor". Ottawa Citizen, October 28, 2014. An out lesbian, McKenney was the first openly LGBT woman to serve on Ottawa's city council."Ottawa elects first openly queer woman to city council" . Xtra Ottawa, October 28, 2014. On December 19, 2019, McKenney has stated that they are non-binary, preferring to use they/them pronouns.https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/ottawa/catherine-mckenney-hateful- email-1.5348881 McKenney has three children. == Political career == Prior to holding elected office, McKenney worked as a staffer in the offices of city councillors Diane Holmes and Alex Munter, and federal Members of Parliament Ed Broadbent and Paul Dewar."Catherine McKenney to run for Somerset Ward". Xtra Ottawa, April 22, 2014. McKenney supported Jim Watson in the 2014 mayoral election."Ottawa votes: Somerset candidates answer our questions". Ottawa Citizen, September 25, 2014. Elected in 2014, McKenney is widely recognized in Ottawa circles for activism in promoting cycling and advocating for better biking infrastructure, as well as LGBT rights. ==Electoral record== ===2018 Ottawa municipal election=== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background- color:#E9E9E9" ! colspan="3"| Somerset Ward (Ward 14) |- style="background- color:#E9E9E9" ! style="width: 170px"|Candidate ! style="width: 50px"|Votes ! style="width: 40px"|% |- |Catherine McKenney || 7,754 || 76.66% |- |Jerry Kovacs || 1,461 || 14.44% |- |Arthur David || 701 || 6.93% |- |Merdod Zopyrus || 199 || 1.97% |- |} ===2014 Ottawa municipal election=== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background-color:#E9E9E9" ! colspan="3"| Somerset Ward (Ward 14) |- style="background-color:#E9E9E9" ! style="width: 170px"|Candidate ! style="width: 50px"|Votes ! style="width: 40px"|% |- |Catherine McKenney || 3997 || 40.13% |- |Jeff Morrison || 1681 || 16.88% |- |Martin Canning ||1631|| 16.38% |- |Conor Meade ||807 ||8.10% |- |Edward Conway ||576 ||5.78% |- |Thomas McVeigh ||434 ||4.36% |- |Lili V. Weemen ||292 ||3.94% |- |Denis Schryburt ||223 ||2.24% |- |Sandro Provenzano ||99 ||0.99% |- |Curtis Tom ||77 ||0.77% |- |Silviu Riley ||43 ||0.43% |- |} ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Ottawa city councillors Category:Living people Category:LGBT municipal councillors in Canada Category:People from Outaouais Category:People with non-binary gender identities Category:21st-century Canadian politicians
